title: Nappa
skills_text:
Add 1 card from your life to your hand : Play up to 1 ＜Saibaiman＞ card from your deck, then shuffle your deck.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may switch up to 1 of your energy to Active Mode, play up to 2 ＜Saibaiman＞ cards from your deck, shuffle your deck, then flip this card over.
skills_back_text:
When this card attacks, play up to 1 ＜Saibaiman＞ card from your deck, then shuffle your deck.
When one of your ＜Saibaiman＞ cards is KO'd, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and it gets -10000 power for the turn.
Look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck, add up to 1 red ＜Vegeta＞ or ＜Nappa＞ card with an energy cost of 4 or less among them to your hand, then shuffle your deck. If you added a card to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand and place it at the bottom of your deck.

title: Yamcha, Wolf Fang Pitching Fistball
skills_text:
When one of your red ＜Saibaiman＞ cards is KO'd, you may play that card from your Drop Area with its skills negated for the turn.
You may choose 1 of your red or green ＜Saibaiman＞ cards and KO it. If you do, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and it gets -10000 power for the turn.
Choose up to 9 of your red or green Battle Cards with an energy cost of 1 and they get +11000 power for the turn.

title: Launch, Inspiring Support
skills_text: , if your Leader Card is a red 《Earthling》 card or a 《Heroine》 card : At the end of a battle where this card was used in a combo, play this card from your Drop Area.

title: Vegeta, the Executioner
skills_text: Choose 1 of your ＜Saibaiman＞ cards and KO it : Draw 1 card, then choose up to 2 of your red ＜Saibaiman＞ cards and they get +11000 power for the turn.

title: Nappa, Testing the Opposition
energy_text: 2()
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is a ＜Nappa＞ card : When this card is played, play up to 2 ＜Saibaiman＞ cards from your deck or Drop Area, then shuffle your deck if you looked through it.
Choose up to 1 of your red ＜Saibaiman＞ cards and it gets +11000 power for the turn.

title: Saibaiman, Infinite Assault
skills_text:
You can include as many copies of this card in your deck as you like.
When this card is KO'd, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with 10000 power or less and KO it.

title: Vegeta, Royal Evolution
energy_text: 2()
skills_text:
, if your opponent has 3 or more energy and it's your turn : At the end of a battle in which you combo with this card from your hand, switch up to 1 of your mono-red Leader Cards to Active Mode, and that card gets +5000 power and has its keyword skills negated for the turn; you can't activate non-keyword Leader Card skills or skills on copies of this card for the turn.
, if your Leader Card is mono-red and you discard this card from your hand : Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and it gets -10000 power for the battle.

title: Golden Frieza, the Perished
skills_text: If you have red and blue cards in your Energy Area and you place 1 card from your life in your Drop Area : For the turn, this card gets +20000 power and can't attack your opponent's Leader Card, and you can't play any Battle Cards except 《Universe 7》 cards.

title: Vegeta the 3rd, Lineage's Beginning
skills_text:
《Vegeta's Lineage》 card with an energy cost of 2.
When this card is played, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and it gets -5000 power for the turn.
: This card gets +11000 power and for the turn.

title: Unexpected Casualties
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is a red ＜Nappa＞ card, you choose 1 card in your hand and discard it, then send this card from your Drop Area to your Warp : Play up to 1 ＜Saibaiman＞ card from your deck, then shuffle your deck.
Choose one of your ＜Saibaiman＞ cards and KO it : Draw 1 card, then choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and it gets -10000 power for the turn.

title: Testing the Opposition
energy_text: 2()
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is mono-red : Negate the attack, then play 1 Saibaiman Token. (Saibaiman Tokens have 5000 power, 0 combo cost, and 5000 combo power.) That Token gains for the turn.
If your life is at 5 or less, you can activate this card's skill from your hand by adding 1 card from your life to your hand instead of paying its energy cost.

title: Tien Shinhan
skills_text:
When this card attacks, draw 1 card, then add up to 1 card from your life to your hand.
Add up to 1 green ＜Chiaotzu＞ card with 5000 power or less from your deck to your hand, shuffle your deck, then negate this skill for the game.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may play 3 Multi-Form Tokens to your Battle Area (Multi-Form Tokens have 10000 power, 0 combo cost, and 5000 combo power), switch up to 1 of your energy to Active Mode, then flip this card over.
skills_back_text:
When this card attacks, draw 1 card, and this card gets +5000 power for the battle.
If you have a total of 3 ＜Tien Shinhan＞ cards and/or Multi-Form Tokens in play in your Battle Area : When this card attacks, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 4 or less and KO it; this card gains for the turn.

title: Launch, the Wild One
energy_text: X()
skills_text:
, if your Leader Card is a 《Heroine》 card : Play this card from your hand with 2 markers on it.
Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, add up to 1 《World Tournament》 or 《Heroine》 card among them to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
Choose any number of your opponent's Battle Cards whose total energy costs add up to 3 or less and KO them.

title: Son Goku, the Long-Awaited Rematch
energy_text: 4()
skills_text:
If your opponent has 3 or more energy and you have {Tien Shinhan, the Long-Awaited Rematch} in play in your Battle Area, this card gets +10000 power and .
, if all of your energy is green and you have a green Battle Card in play : Play this card from your hand, then add up to 1 card from your life to your hand.

title: Tien Shinhan, the Long-Awaited Rematch
energy_text: 5()
skills_text:
This card can't be played from any area by skills other than its own.
When this card is played, choose all of your opponent's Battle Cards with energy costs of 5 or less and KO them.
, if you have {Son Goku, the Long-Awaited Rematch} in play : Play this card from your hand.

title: Chiaotzu, Unwanted Reunion
skills_text: If your Leader Card is a green ＜Tien Shinhan＞ card : When this card is KO'd, add up to 1 card from your life to your hand, play up to 1 green ＜Tien Shinhan＞ card with an energy cost of 3 from your deck, then shuffle your deck. The card you played with this skill can't attack until the end of your next turn.

title: Mercenary Tao, Overflowing Confidence
energy_text: 3()
skills_text:
, place this card in its owner's Drop Area : When this card deals damage to your opponent by attacking, play up to 1 green ＜Mercenary Tao＞ card with an energy cost of 4 from your deck with its skills negated for the turn, then shuffle your deck.
, if you have a green 《World Tournament》 card in play : Play this card from your hand, then choose up to 1 of you or your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 1 or less and KO it. You can't activate the skill on copies of this card for the turn.

title: Broly, the Swift Berserker
energy_text: 4()

: When this card is played, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and KO it. If you do, choose up to 1 mono-green ＜Broly＞ card with an skill in your hand and play it on top of this card.
, if your Leader Card is mono-green and you have 3 or more energy : You may choose 1 of your mono-green Battle Cards with an energy cost of 1 and ＜Broly＞ in its character name or a mono-green Extra Card with an energy cost of 1 and the skill and place it in its owner's Drop Area. If you do, play this card from your hand.

title: Broly, the Tamed Beast
skills_text:
Add 1 card from your life to your hand : When this card attacks, it gets +11000 power for the turn.
, if your Leader Card is a mono-green ＜Broly＞ card : When this card in your Battle Area is placed in its owner's Drop Area by a skill or KO'd, choose up to 1 mono-green ＜Broly＞ card with an energy cost of 4 or less in your hand and play it.

title: Ribrianne, the Power of Support
energy_text: 4()
skills_text:
This card can't be played by skills from any area.
When this card is played, play 1 green ＜Kakunsa＞ and 1 green ＜Rozie＞ card with energy costs of 4 or less from your deck or Drop Area with their skills negated for the turn, then shuffle your deck if you looked through it. You can only play mono-green cards for the rest of the game.

title: Ribrianne, Pretty Cannon Unleashed
skills_text:
When this card is played, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, add up to 1 green 《Universe 2》 card or 1 《Heroine》 card among them to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
, if your Leader Card is green or a 《Heroine》 card and you have 3 or more green energy : Play up to 1 green 《Universe 2》 card with an energy cost of 3 or less from your deck with a character name different from any Battle Cards you have in play, then shuffle your deck.

title: Kakunsa, Feral Fury
skills_text:
When this card is played, draw 1 card.
If your opponent has 8 or more cards in their hand and 3 or more energy : This card gets +16000 power and until the start of your next Main Phase.

title: Rozie, Blast Manipulator
energy_text: 3()
skills_text: If your Leader Card is green or a 《Heroine》 card : When you play this card from your hand, your opponent chooses 2 cards in their hand and discards them. This card gains for the turn.

title: Goku's Solar Flare
skills_text:
Negate the attack.
If your Leader Card is a green ＜Son Goku＞ card or a 《World Tournament》 card : Choose up to 4 of your opponent's Battle Cards and those cards can't activate skills for the turn. If you have a green ＜Son Goku＞ card in play, draw 1 card.
